title: kuchEla paripala
sahitya:
kucEla paripAla mAmava kanaka cEla sundara kapOla shrIdhara

anupallavi

 suca caritra sUri vinuti pAtra sujana mitra sUrya sOma nEtra

caraNam 1

 dvArakApura vihAra suraripu vidhAra sakala shruti sAra vicAra 
sAra sAra sukumAra sharIra samara dhIra sAdhu janAdhAra
 
caraNam 2

 nAradArcita padAra vinda sarasIruhAsana purAri vandya 
nakha dhIra vanadhi gambhIra durita samhAra yadukula dhhArAdharA
 
caraNam 3

 sadAnuDavani manambulO nanu dinambu dalacucu vinam maDaitE 
ghanambugA nanu ganangona kaniTu anAdaraNa sAya nyAyamA hari
 
caraNam 4

 kAma janaka ripu bhIma bhakta jana kAmita phaladuDavani ninu mrokkiti 
rAmacandrapura vara shrI vEnkaTaramaN bhAgavata sannuta padayuga
